name: Medic!
description:
Medic! is about a brave and pacifistic soldiers who desperatly tries to keep his fellow soldiers alive.

He is always on the lookout for wounded soldiers on the battlefield and drags them of to the sickbay to heal up and continue fighting the fight.

Controls:

You move with WASD keys and can carry soldiers with the F key.
If you fellow soldiers are in desperate need to immediate help you can bandage the wounds to slower the bleeding with E. To save lives at the last minute you can use the morphium syringe with Q.

- WASD | Left Joystick: Movement
- F | XBox A | Dualshock Cross: Carry soldiers
- E | XBox X | Dualshock Square: Bandage wound
- Q | XBox B | Dualshow Circle: Morphium syringe
